text: Augusto Premoli or Luis MÃ¡ximo Premoli was a modern pentathlete from Argentina. Augusto competed at the 1948 Summer Olympics. He was born on November 29, 1925 and died on November 16, 2018.Augusto Premoli == References == Category:1925 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Olympians for Argentina Category:Modern pentathletes Category:Sportspeople from Buenos Aires
